amendment.description: Amendment restores funding for the Perpetually Available and Secure Information Systems program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert "(reduced by $5,000,000)(increased by $5,000,000)" on page 27, line 17, after the first dollar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murtha amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Murtha.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murtha amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
